name: Dragonite
flavorText:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

previous.name: Dragonair
previous.flavorText:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

next.name: Mewtwo
next.flavorText:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.flavorText:

mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.
